amendatorysection.catchline: Complete record; duty of clerk; waiver.
amendatorysection.para: The clerk shall make a complete record of every cause, as soon as it is finally determined, unless such record, or some part thereof, is duly waived.

annotation.para: Duty devolves on each successive incumbent. Boettcher v. Lancaster County, 74 Neb. 148, 103 N.W. 1075 (1905).
Complete record of mortgage foreclosure must be made unless waived by all parties to suit. Johnson v. Rawls, 39 Neb. 351, 58 N.W. 132 (1894)).
Provisions as to time of making and signing are directory. Colony v. Billingsley, 2 Neb. Unof. 670, 89 N.W. 744 (1902).
